#text=Yesterday , I went to get a hair cut .
#text=I made an appointment with my hairstylist a week prior .
#text=I was tired of my long hair so I decided it was time for a new hair look .
#text=Even though , I wanted a new hair style , I was still very nervous .
#text=Cutting hair is a very big change .
#text=Before she cut my hair , she washed my hair .
#text=After she washed it , she did n't do a big chop .
#text=She cut little by little so I wo n't be in utter shock .
#text=Every time she cut it , I took a deep breath and accepted it .
#text=After all , hair does grow back eventually .
#text=Eventually she managed to cut it at the specific length I wanted it .
#text=Afterwards , she layered it and styled it properly .
#text=At this point , she did n't let me see the final result until she was finished .
#text=When she was done , she turned me over to the mirror and I was shocked .
